description: megg - Memory for AI Agents. Auto-loads context at session start.

hooks.prompt: Review the session briefly. If the user made significant architectural decisions, discovered patterns worth reusing, or encountered gotchas/traps, suggest they capture these with megg learn() before stopping. Format: megg learn(title, type, topics, content). Types: decision, pattern, gotcha, context. If only routine work was done, allow stopping. Session context: $ARGUMENTS
